org.drip.spaces.graph

Class DijkstraScheme

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.spaces.graph.DijkstraScheme

  • public class DijkstraScheme
extends java.lang.Object
    DijkstraScheme implements the Dijkstra Algorithm for finding the Shortest Path between a Pair of Vertexes in a Graph. The References are: 1) Wikipedia (2018a): Graph (Abstract Data Type) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Graph_(abstract_data_type). 2) Wikipedia (2018b): Graph Theory https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Graph_theory. 3) Wikipedia (2018c): Graph (Discrete Mathematics) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Graph_(discrete_mathematics). 4) Wikipedia (2018d): Dijkstra's Algorithm https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dijkstra%27s_algorithm. 5) Wikipedia (2018e): Bellman-Ford Algorithm https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bellman%E2%80%93Ford_algorithm.
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
